feed.title: Little Grand Rapids - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Little Grand Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 a.m. CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low plus 1.
